statements: UPDATE ar_user_interactions SET engagement_score = 100 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND interaction_type = 'click'
UPDATE ar_user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like', engagement_score = 150 WHERE user_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE ar_user_interactions SET engagement_score = 100 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND interaction_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
UPDATE ar_user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'click', engagement_score = 50 WHERE user_id = 'fedcba98-7654-3210-ba98-654321fedcba' AND interaction_timestamp = '2022-02-15 09:30:00'
UPDATE UserInteractions SET action='click', timestamp='2022-01-10 12:30:00' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE EngagementMetrics SET engagement_score=85, interaction_count=20 WHERE user_id=456;
UPDATE UserInteractions SET action='Like' WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
UPDATE EngagementMetrics SET engagement_score=80, interaction_count = interaction_count + 1 WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'click' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE app_engagement SET engagement_score = 80, session_duration = 120 WHERE user_id = 456 AND app_id = 789;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type='like' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE app_engagement SET engagement_score=150, session_duration=60 WHERE user_id=2 AND app_id=3;
UPDATE user_interaction SET interaction_duration = 60 WHERE user_id = 12345 AND interaction_type = 'click';
UPDATE app_session SET session_duration = 120 WHERE session_id = 100 AND user_id = 54321;
UPDATE user_interaction SET interaction_duration = 60 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET total_interactions = total_interactions + 1, average_duration = (SELECT AVG(interaction_duration) FROM user_interaction) WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', username='newusername' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE app_errors SET error_description='New error description' WHERE error_id=3;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', date_created = '2021-08-15 09:30:00' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET engagement_score = 85 WHERE user_id = 2 AND session_id = 5 AND interaction_id = 10;
